name: Coinflip Tavern
description:
You bought more mead at the tavern than you had money to pay for, and your only chance now is gambling. You have 10 gold coins left, you need 20 to pay your tab, and if you lose all your gold, the guards will throw you in jail. Bet wisely.

Made with Makecode Arcade for Low Effort Jam 9 and also playable here: https://makecode.com/_T0VHUHKvzKAu

Controls

AD/arrow keys: move cursor

Z/space: choose a side

Cover Image: Alignment Png vectors by Lovepik.com
